references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundation of score-based generative modeling using SDEs, a crucial concept for understanding and improving the sampling efficiency of diffusion models.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models compared to GANs for image synthesis, highlighting the significance of diffusion models as a powerful class of generative models.
This book provides a comprehensive theoretical foundation of stochastic differential equations, which are essential for understanding and analyzing the mathematics underlying diffusion models.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are among the first widely-used diffusion models, and lays the groundwork for many subsequent developments.

references.paper_title: Image restoration with mean-reverting stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the mean-reverting diffusion model (MR-Diffusion), which is the central focus of the current paper and enables more controlled generation in diffusion models.
